Name: Peterborough Community Library, Local History Collection

About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon-Fri 9am-5pm and Wed 9am-7pm, Sat 9am-12pm; closed Sunday and public holidays. General reference assistance available. Copying services available for books, journals, original records to A3 and microfilms. Additional services include searches on Peterborough Times index and cemetery records. Photographs indexed and scanned on CD-ROM, so are able to view photos on computer. 1996 will see a colour printer attached to this computer, therefore it will be possible to get printouts of photos for a small cost.

About.Major holdings: Corporation of Peterborough: Cemetery records 1860- . Peterborough Library: Peterborough Times 1887-1950.
